alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 11 at 8:43PM CST until January 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND NORTHWESTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 843 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oliver, or 11 miles northwest of Waldron, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Oliver... Echo... Cauthron... Hon... Lucas... Liberty... Ione... Elm Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
